snippet: The State Department, under Secretary Hillary Rodham Clinton, created a special arrangement for Huma Abedin to work as a consultant while serving as a top department adviser.
abstract: Huma Abedin did not disclose consulting work she did while serving in State Department,   requirement of public employees; disclosure of arrangement comes as her husband, former Democratic Rep Anthony D Weiner, prepares for a mayoral run in New York City.
lead_paragraph: The State Department, under Secretary Hillary Rodham Clinton, created a special arrangement for Huma Abedin to work as a consultant while serving as a top department adviser.

headline.seo: Weiner’s Wife, Huma Abedin, Failed to Disclose Consulting Work Done While a State Dept. Aide
headline.main: Weiner’s Wife Didn’t Disclose Consulting Work She Did While Serving in State Dept.
headline.print_headline: Weiner’s Wife Didn’t Disclose Consulting Work She Did While Serving in State Dept.
